qas.question: In what year did Napoleon marry Joséphine de Beauharnais?
How old was Napoleon when he married Joséphine de Beauharnais?
How old was Joséphine de Beauharnais when she was married to Napoleon?
What was the disliked name Joséphine de Beauharnais was known as before she met Napoleon?

context: Napoleon married <a0_0>Joséphine de Beauharnais<a0_0/> in <a1_0>1796<a1_0/>, when he was <a2_0>26<a2_0/>; she was a <a3_0>32<a3_0/>-year-old widow whose first husband had been executed during the Revolution. Until she met Bonaparte, she had been known as "<a4_0>Rose<a4_0/>", a name which he disliked. He called her "Joséphine" instead, and she went by this name henceforth. Bonaparte often sent her love letters while on his campaigns. He formally adopted her son Eugène and cousin Stéphanie and arranged dynastic marriages for them. Joséphine had her daughter Hortense marry Napoleon's brother Louis.
